result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Ramone L Jones
Current: 2008 1/2 N Wisconsin Street, Racine, WI 53403 United States  (Effective: 02-04-2016)
Prior: 2013 Carmel Ave, Racine, WI 53405

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:    No contact with the victim (person, property, residence or family). JAM   Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  You have been ordered to have to provide a DNA sample as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Office Records Bureau. Hours:  Monday through Friday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:30 a.m.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

**AMENDED 2/4/2016** It is a condition of this bond that the defendant  NOT consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances - bond condition(s) to be monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc., located at 524 S Main Street in Racine (262-632-1780).  You are to report to their office immediately following your hearing.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance. No contact with the victim J.A.M. OR J.M.M. (person, property, residence or family).	May not communicate with the victims through social media or by use of phone.

Defendant Ramone L Jones in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Dirk Christian Jensen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue
St- Personal service has been made on two of the State's witnesses and substitute service on the other one.
Def- Request the bond be returned to the poster in 15CF1183 and be given a signature bond.
St- Objects to the modification of the bond.
BTC: Bond amended to $5,000 signature bond. No drugs or alcohol with ZCI to monitor, no contact with the victims and no posting on social media. Cash bond to be returned to the poster Patrice Jones.
Status conference at 02-04-2016 08:30 am

BTC: No action taken today. Will review this matter.
